Article Title: Tom Brady's son Jack ditches stepmom Gisele BÃ¼ndchen for special outing with his birth mother Bridget Moynahan
Article Text:
Bridget Moynahan - Tom Brady - Gisele BÃ¼ndchen (Getty Images)

Bridget Moynahan shares her courtside tradition with son Jack at Arthur Ashe Stadium

Celebrity families often turn heads when they step out in public, and that was the case at this yearâ€™s US Open when actress Bridget Moynahan attended courtside with her son, Jack. The outing came less than a week after NFL legend Tom Brady marked Jackâ€™s milestone 18th birthday with an emotional social media post.On Wednesday, Bridget Moynahan posted a selfie from Arthur Ashe Stadium, capturing the tennis action and her special night with Jack. She captioned the photo, â€œTraditions at the US Open. Thank you Emirates for hosting an incredible night of tennis.â€The sighting added to the significance of the week, as it followed Jackâ€™s birthday celebrations on August 22. Jack, born in 2007, has grown up in the public eye as the son of Brady and Moynahan, who dated from 2004 to 2006.Six days earlier, Tom Brady had shared a heartfelt tribute to his eldest son. â€œFrom little steps to big dreams, happy birthday Jack. Youâ€™ve always shown grace, courage, love, and kindness since the day you were born. Iâ€™m so proud of the man you are! Welcome to adulthoodâ€”it comes with higher credit card limits, bigger bills, and no curfewâ€¦ well, maybe not all at once!â€He added, â€œA dadâ€™s heart soars with his childrenâ€™s happiness, not with his own.We love you so much, and I know this will be your best year yet.â€Also Read: â€œHe was stunnedâ€: Tom Brady was blindsided when Gisele BÃ¼ndchen revealed she was expecting Joaquim Valenteâ€™s child Tom Brady and Bridget Moynahanâ€™s relationship ended before Jackâ€™s birth, yet both have maintained a respectful co-parenting dynamic over the years. With Tom Bradyâ€™s ex-wife Gisele BÃ¼ndchen also sharing family updates recently, itâ€™s clear the former quarterbackâ€™s blended family continues to prioritize love, support, and stability for their childrenâ€”something fans have long admired.The father-son duo have seemingly spent even more quality time together after Tom Brady announced his retirement from the NFL in February 2023.
Article Summary: Bridget moynahan attended the us open with her son, jack, on wednesday. The outing came less than a week after tom brady marked jack's 18th birthday. Brady posted an emotional tribute to his eldest son on august 22. The couple dated from 2004 to 2006.

Article Title: Travis Hunter receives heartfelt fatherhood advice from Deion Sanders, who considers the Jaguars rookie â€œlike a sonâ€
Article Text:
Deion Sanders gives Travis Hunter fatherhood guidance (Imagn Images)

Deion Sandersâ€™ advice for Travis Hunter as a new dad



Travis Hunter embraces fatherhood and NFL dreams



Travis Hunter is stepping into fatherhood and the NFL at the same time, and one man who has been by his side throughout this journey is Deion Sanders. The Hall of Famer, who once recruited Hunter to Jackson State and later coached him at Colorado, recently shared heartfelt fatherly advice for the Jacksonville Jaguars rookie as he embraces lifeâ€™s two biggest milestones â€” becoming a professional athlete and a dad.For Sanders, Travis Hunter has always been more than a player. Their bond goes back to 2021 when Hunter, then the No. 1 recruit in the nation, shocked everyone by committing to Jackson State instead of a powerhouse like Florida State. He later followed Sanders to Colorado, where he won the 2024 Heisman Trophy as a two-way sensation. Through it all, Sanders played a fatherly role, especially during Hunterâ€™s toughest moments.On the night Hunter lifted the Heisman, his biological father was absent due to legal troubles. Sanders stepped in, embracing the young star in what became one of the most emotional moments of Hunterâ€™s career. Years later, when Sanders was quietly battling a bladder cancer scare and couldnâ€™t attend Hunterâ€™s wedding, the rookie showed up at his coachâ€™s Texas ranch, standing by him as the two shared quiet moments fishing together.â€œOh my god, Iâ€™m taking a deep breath because I love him to life â€” I love him like heâ€™s my son,â€ Sanders said. â€œItâ€™s funny when your son is now a fatherâ€¦ itâ€™s a beautiful thing.â€œThe thing that I told him is letâ€™s correct all the things that we think we didnâ€™t receive as children and letâ€™s do that in our fatherhood. No matter what happens, letâ€™s make sure we are the best darn father that ever walked. Thatâ€™s what I told him. Iâ€™m proud of him, I love him to life, and I miss him dearly.â€It wasnâ€™t coach-speak. It was a father figure speaking to someone he considers family.Hunter, just 22, is now a husband and a father. He and his longtime girlfriend, Leanna Lenee, tied the knot earlier this year before welcoming their first child, a baby boy. In a heartfelt video titled â€œDear Sonâ€¦â€, Hunter can be heard saying to his newborn, â€œGotta be better than me.â€The timing couldnâ€™t be more symbolic. On September 7, Hunter will make his NFL debut when the Jaguars face the Carolina Panthers. It marks the start of two parallel journeys: one on the field as a top draft pick, and one at home as a father. With Sandersâ€™ wisdom and his own determination, Hunter now carries two legacies â€” as a rising NFL star and as a dad committed to doing things right. Fans and critics will be watching Hunter how he make his debut a dreamy one.Also Read: Justin Jefferson injury update: Vikings may take cautious approach as hamstring issue raises long-term concerns
Article Summary: Deion sanders gives travis hunter fatherhood guidance. The hall of famer once recruited hunter to jackson state and later coached him at colorado. On september 7, hunter will make his nfl debut when the jaguars face the carolina panthers. Hunter and his longtime girlfriend, leanna lenee, tied the knot earlier this year before welcoming their first child.

Article Title: Reese Ketler paralyzed in hockey game and then hears a doctorâ€™s message he never expected
Article Text:
Reese Ketler paralyzed in hockey game and then hears a doctorâ€™s message he never expected (Image via Getty)

Reese Ketlerâ€™s accident and recovery journey

â€œYou can still be successful. This will not end your life if you choose to fight.â€

Also Read:

Reese Ketlerâ€™s new life and message

Reese Ketler was 18 years old when his hockey dream came to a sudden stop on December 19, 2019, in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The young defenseman for the St. Vital Victorias junior team collided headfirst into the boards after a hit during a game. That moment left him with a spinal cord injury that paralyzed him. Now 25, Ketler says he feels â€œluckyâ€ to share his story with thousands online and inspire others who face the same fight.The injury happened in Winnipeg while his mother was watching from the stands. Trainers and firefighters rushed to him, and he was quickly taken by ambulance to the hospital. He remembers losing feeling in his legs and praying as doctors prepared for surgery. His family filled the waiting area, fearing the worst.Doctors told him the truth that he might never walk again. But one doctor gave him strength by saying,Those words gave him hope.Ketler spent four days in intensive care before moving to rehab. At first, he could not move his fingers, but with daily therapy, he slowly regained strength.He worked out twice a day, rebuilding muscle and practicing small hand movements. Though the first year felt depressing, he stayed focused and kept pushing through.Reese Ketler stayed in rehab for months before finally returning home to Winnipeg. When the COVID-19 lockdown began, he faced long days alone without visitors, but he kept going.His determination cut his recovery time short, and he went home two months earlier than doctors expected. Today, Reese Ketler is a content creator with more than 361,000 TikTok followers. He uses his platform to motivate others, saying life after a spinal cord injury is not over.â€œIâ€™m really lucky to be in the position where I can create content and inspire people,â€ he says. His story shows how tragedy can lead to strength and a new purpose.
Article Summary: Reese ketler was 18 years old when his hockey dream came to a sudden stop. The young defenseman collided headfirst into the boards after a hit during a game. That moment left him with a spinal cord injury that paralyzed him. Now 25, ketler says he feels â€œluckyâ€™ to share his story with thousands online.

Article Title: â€œItâ€™s very planned": Bryan Hayes calls out Connor McDavidâ€™s "manipulative" comments about his future with the Edmonton Oilers

Itâ€™s very planned. Itâ€™s obviously been something he and his team have worked out."He added, â€œThey knew this question was coming, and they know itâ€™s going to continue to come..."However, neither Connor McDavid nor his team, the Edmonton Oilers, have responded to Bryan Hayesâ€™ statement as they remain silent about the captainâ€™s extension.Connor McDavid debuted in the NHL with the Edmonton Oilers and has been with the team for a number of years now and it seems his only focus has been on winning the Stanley Cup for the team.While many fans expected the Edmonton Oilers to lift the Stanley Cup this season, it unfortunately went to the Florida Panthers.Connor McDavid looked pretty heartbroken as the Edmonton Oilers lost the final match and he has mostly maintained a pretty low profile life since then.Connor McDavidâ€™s wife, Lauren Kyle, has been pretty active on social media and the two were even spotted together at Leon Draisaitlâ€™s lavish wedding recently.As of now, it seems Connor McDavid is fully focused on taking a break and enjoying some time away from the ice with his wife and friends.Also Read: Canadaâ€™s 2026 Olympic roster could spark chaos with Connor Bedard and Macklin Celebrini pushing legends aside

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky and the Canadian identity crisis: why the Great One no longer defines hockey
Article Text:
Tired of too many ads? go ad free now

Hockeyâ€™s cultural landscape has moved beyond one manâ€™s legacy

The Canadian identity crisis goes deeper than Wayne Gretzkyâ€™s shadow

Tired of too many ads? go ad free now

For decades, Wayne Gretzky stood as the ultimate symbol of Canadian hockey pride. His dazzling play and unmatched records gave Canada a face in the global sports arena, and his legacy still commands respect. Yet as the game evolves, a cultural shift is forcing Canadians to reconsider whether Gretzky still embodies the sportâ€™s identity.When Gretzky retired, many believed his status as â€œThe Great Oneâ€ would eternally tie him to Canadaâ€™s hockey soul. But todayâ€™s NHL reflects a broader, more global identity. Stars like Connor McDavid , Auston Matthews, and Sidney Crosby have taken the torch, while international icons from Sweden, Russia, and the United States increasingly shape the league.Canadaâ€™s hockey culture is no longer built solely on a single national figurehead. Instead, it reflects diversity, new styles of play, and a growing international influence. Gretzkyâ€™s records still hold weight, but younger generations see him as a legend of the past, not the face of todayâ€™s game.The debate isnâ€™t about Gretzkyâ€™s greatness, itâ€™s about what he represents. Canada once relied on him to symbolize dominance and unity in hockey. But as the sport evolves, Canadians are confronting uncomfortable questions about their place in a game they no longer exclusively own.Hockeyâ€™s growth in non-traditional markets, combined with Canadaâ€™s struggles to consistently dominate on the world stage, has fueled this identity crisis. While Gretzky remains the most iconic name in hockey history, he no longer reflects the modern state of the sport or Canadaâ€™s role within it.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky's daughter Paulina Gretzky turns head in bold gothic look during Italian getaway with Dustin Johnson In the end, Gretzkyâ€™s influence will never disappear, but Canadaâ€™s hockey identity now extends beyond his shadow. For the sport to thrive, Canadians must embrace a future where their cultural connection to hockey isnâ€™t defined by just one man, no matter how great he was.
Article Summary: The canadian identity crisis goes deeper than wayne gretzkyâ€™s shadow. The debate isnâ€™t about his greatness, it's about what he represents. Canada once relied on him to symbolize dominance and unity in hockey. But as the sport evolves, canadians are confronting questions about their place in a game they no longer exclusively own.

Article Title: "My wife absolutely kills it": Josh Allen reveals why his wifeâ€™s performance in Sinners made him cry uncontrollably
Article Text:

Josh Allen gets emotional over Hailee Steinfeldâ€™s success

Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen has been in the spotlight plenty of times, but his latest candid conversation with NFL Networkâ€™s Kyle Brandt might be the most revealing yet. Captured by Hard Knocks cameras during preseason, the exchange showed not only Allenâ€™s pride in his wife Hailee Steinfeld â€™s new movie Sinners but also his unshakable belief in bringing a Super Bowl to Buffalo.When Brandt asked Allen about Sinners, the quarterback couldnâ€™t hide his admiration for Steinfeldâ€™s performance alongside Michael B. Jordan. He called the movie â€œan A+,â€ adding, â€œMy wife absolutely kills it. And hopefully, awards season coming around, people make the right decisions.â€Allenâ€™s praise didnâ€™t stop there. Asked whether it was a hot take to call Steinfeld the most talented person in their household, Allen immediately agreed: â€œAbsolutely not. A thousand percent. And Iâ€™m okay with it.â€ He revealed he was moved to tears at the filmâ€™s premiere. â€œWhen we watched it at the premier I was crying at the end. I was just so proud of her. I get emotional thinking about it. It was a pretty cool experience.With the Academy Awards scheduled for March 2026, just weeks after the Super Bowl, Steinfeldâ€™s name could well be in the conversation for Best Supporting Actress. That means the Allen household may be preparing for not just one but two unforgettable celebrations this winter.While Allen beamed with pride over Steinfeld, his own dreams remain fixed on Buffalo. He told Brandt that he has already envisioned the Billsâ€™ first Lombardi Trophy parade in vivid detail. â€œItâ€™s not written down, but itâ€™s up there,â€ he said of the victory speech he plans to deliver.Allen painted the scene: a frigid five-degree day, buses rolling through icy streets, and thousands of fans filling downtown Buffalo as the team makes its way to City Hall. â€œI can feel it,â€ he said. â€œI see it all. So, gotta turn it into a reality.â€For Allen, itâ€™s more than just optimismâ€”itâ€™s manifestation. By speaking his vision into existence, heâ€™s aligning personal pride with professional ambition. And if fate plays along, the coming months could define both his career and his familyâ€™s legacy in unforgettable fashion.Also Read: Experts warn Ravensâ€™ Buffalo Bills woes may continue, but Lamar Jackson could flip the script under the lights
Article Summary: Josh allen opens up about wife hailee steinfeldâ€™s new movie sinners. He revealed he was moved to tears at the film's premiere. Allen also revealed he has already envisioned the billsâ€™ first lombardi trophy parade in vivid detail.

Article Title: MrBeast sparks frenzy with bold NFL takeover claim in YouTube video before Chargers vs Chiefs game
Article Text:
MrBeast sparks frenzy with bold NFL takeover claim in YouTube video before Chargers vs Chiefs game (Image via Getty)

Did MrBeast buy the NFL? Owning with Roger Goodell and spotlights YouTube creators

â€œWeâ€™re at this culture-changing moment in entertainment and with the first live NFL game broadcasting on YouTube for free this Friday, weâ€™re showing the world that the most engaging way to experience sports is with the creators you love.â€

â€œGo big or go home, so for this one, I figured why not just buy the entire NFL?â€

YouTube to stream Chargers vs Chiefs live: When, where, and what to expect

Time- Pre-game starts at 4 p.m. PT / 7 p.m. ET, and the game kicks off at 5 p.m. PT / 8 p.m. ET on Friday, September 5, 2025.

Platforms- The game happens at SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil, and will be streamed live and free on YouTube worldwide.

Original segments by creators Michelle Khare and Marques Brownlee will appear.

The pre-game show and broadcast team includes YouTube creators Kay Adams, Peter Overzet, and NFL legends Cam Newton, Derek Carr, Brandon Marshall, Tyrann Mathieu, joined during the game by Rich Eisen, Kurt Warner, Stacey Dales, Terry McAulay, RenÃ© Giraldo, Edgar Lopez, and creator/former kicker Deestroying.

MrBeast stars in a new fun video from YouTube. In it, he jokes about buying the NFL and giving each team a spot for YouTube creators. The Week 1 game features the Los Angeles Chargers against the Kansas City Chiefs, marking YouTubeâ€™s first-ever exclusive live NFL broadcast.Jimmy Donaldson appears alongside NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell in the video. The creators featured include Dude Perfect, Sketch, Valkyrae, Adam W, IShowSpeed, Haley Kalil, Ben Azelart, Hannah Stocking, Clix, Celine Dept, and Brooke Monkâ€”together they have nearly 695 million subscribers.MrBeast says,He adds with a laugh:Extras during the broadcast:Also Read: â€œRespect Women, Or Elseâ€¦â€: Cardi B Explodes Outside California Courthouse After Offset Brag And Stefon Diggs Pregnancy Question YouTube stepping in to stream a full NFL game live, especially for free, marks a big moment. Itâ€™s the first time YouTube will be a live broadcaster for the NFL, and it brings a fresh, interactive twist by involving popular creators. This shows how entertainment is changing, blending sports, creator culture, and global access all in one event.

â€œThe Pat McAfee Showâ€

Reactions pour in and why the change impacts NFL RedZone

â€œup in armsâ€

â€œcommercial-freeâ€

Scott Hanson, the friendly host of NFL RedZone, told everyone on September 3, 2025, that NFL RedZone will not be fully free of commercials anymore. He said the show will now have full ad breaks. He also plans to change his signature opening line fromto justThis is big news because RedZone has always been known for showing all the touchdowns and big moments without stopping for ads.Scott Hanson made this announcement duringon Wednesday, September 3, 2025. He said he no longer has the wordsin his opening. He will now say,People loved how RedZone never paused for ads, so this change feels sad for many fans. That test sparked complaints and forced Scott Hanson to dropfrom his intro even then.RedZone is special because it jumps from game to game to show every score. It keeps fans who love fantasy football and fast moves hooked. Now, with full commercials, that pace might feel different even if Hanson promises he wonâ€™t let exciting moments get lost.

Article Title: NBA Hall of Famer spills beans on Michal Jordan and Kobe Bryant in comparison to Los Angeles Lakers legend LeBron James
Article Text:
Charles Barkley (Image credit: TNT)



Charles Barkley says LeBron James is a nice guy unlike Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant

Charles Barkley on Skinny Luka, the Eagles, and His ESPN Partnership | The Bill Simmons Podcast



Reactions to Charles Barkleyâ€™s take

The debate over who the GOAT is among Michael Jordan Kobe Bryant , and LeBron James will never end, but Charles Barkley has added a fresh perspective to the conversation. The NBA legend shared his thoughts on the differences between the three players, and why he believes LeBron James stands out as a person.Charles Barkley, who has some free time during the NBA offseason, recently appeared on The Bill Simmons Podcast where he discussed his views on LeBron James, Kobe Bryant, and Michael Jordan.He told Bill Simmons, â€œThe three best players I've ever seen were Michael, Kobe, and LeBron. And I'll tell you the difference in the three... Michael and Kobe are dangerous. They'll kill your a**. LeBron's a nice guy, and that's not a knock. He's still great, great, great, but he's a nice guy. Michael and Kobe aren't nice guys. They're different.â€Doubling down on his opinion, Barkley added, â€œI always tell people the difference between Michael and Kobe, man, they are dangerous. I mean, they really wanted to kill you and humiliate you.â€It is to be noted, Barkley made it clear that he never had that killer mentality. â€œEverybody's not built like that. I'm not even built like that.I think I'm a pseudo-tough guy. I want to win, but I'm just not like those guys.â€However, Barkley stopped short of ranking LeBron above Jordan in the GOAT debate. He explained, â€œLeBron is amazing. What he's done in the community is amazing. In fairness, I wouldn't even put LeBron past Kobe, let's get that out of the way. I want to be fair. The reason I put Michael up there, above those other guys â€” LeBron has stacked his teams, let's be realistic.â€NBA fans agreed with Barkleyâ€™s take. One fan wrote on YouTube, â€œWhat an incredible interview â€” great NBA stories, talking about Kobe, MJ, and Bron without hating on any of them (though slight jabs at Bron lol) â€” and then the detailed discussion about the business aspect of Inside the NBA. Hoping for more of these with more players from the 90s!â€Another fan commented, â€œChuck has his quirks, but one thing that always shines through whenever I listen to him is that he is genuinely a really good guy.â€Also Read: Los Angeles Lakers coach claims Luka Doncic and LeBron James have improved in each otherâ€™s company: â€œI think itâ€™s two-way motivatingâ€ LeBron James is currently the most senior active player in the NBA. He even got the chance to play alongside his son, Bronny James, with the Los Angeles Lakers last season. After the Lakers were ousted from the playoffs, rumors of LeBron retiring began circulating. However, James put all speculation to rest and confirmed that he will return next season.
Article Summary: Charles barkley says lebron james is a nice guy unlike michael jordan and kobe bryant. The nba legend shared his thoughts on the differences between the three players, and why he believes lebron james stands out as a person. Barkley stopped short of ranking lebron above jordan in the goat debate.

Article Title: P.J. Washington signs $90 million contract extension ahead of 2025 NBA season with the Dallas Mavericks

Article Title: Brittany Mahomes partners with Dallas haircare brand Divi to bring game-day glam to the 2025 NFL season

Dallas-based haircare brand Divi is turning heads this NFL season with its new collaboration featuring Brittany Mahomes, wife of Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes. Known for her effortless style and close friendship with pop superstar Taylor Swift, Brittany is set to become a central figure in Diviâ€™s campaign, bringing a mix of star power and everyday elegance to football fans nationwide.Founded in 2021 by Dani Austin and Jordan Ramirez, Divi focuses on holistic scalp and hair health, promoting transparency, community, and long-term hair wellness. Austinâ€™s personal experience with hair loss inspired the brand, which has grown rapidly with support from investors such as Menlo Parkâ€™s Norwest.â€œWhen you feel your best, you lead with power and thatâ€™s what Divi is here for,â€ Austin said. â€œBrittany embodies the strength, style, and authenticity we champion as a brand. Sheâ€™s a leader in her space, a hands-on mom, and a powerful businesswoman who already loved and used our products. This partnership couldnâ€™t be a more natural fit.â€With Taylor Swift and Travis Kelceâ€™s engagement announcement fueling massive NFL viewership, especially among women 18â€“49, Brittanyâ€™s presence in Chiefs broadcasts is expected to be more prominent than ever.Divi aims to leverage this spotlight, highlighting Brittanyâ€™s favorite products from game-day prep to home self-care routines.As part of the partnership, Divi will release a limited-edition Brittany Mahomes x Divi Game Day Bundle, enabling fans to recreate the NFL WAGâ€™s signature healthy hair look. The collaboration will also feature exclusive content, social activations, and sweepstakes for fans to win a full â€œultimate game day experience.â€â€œAt Divi, scalp care isnâ€™t just a beauty trend, itâ€™s the foundation for every great hair day,â€ Austin added. â€œPartnering with Brittany lets us share that message with women who admire her strength, style, and self-care ethos.â€Also Read: A billion-dollar love story: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's fairytale proposal comes with billion-dollar stakes Brittany Mahomesâ€™ new role with Divi is poised to redefine how fans connect with football culture, blending wellness, style, and star-powered inspiration on and off the field.
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes is the wife of kansas city chiefs quarterback patrick mahomes. She is known for her effortless style and close friendship with pop superstar taylor swift. Divi focuses on holistic scalp and hair health, promoting transparency, community, and long-term hair wellness.

Article Title: Is Niko Mikkola the Florida Panthersâ€™ secret weapon behind Aleksander Barkov and Sergei Bobrovsky?
Article Text:
Niko Mikkola of the Florida Panthers poses for a portrait (Credit: Getty Images)

Niko Mikkola 2024-25 Season Highlights ğŸ”¥

Niko Mikkolaâ€™s rise from depth defenseman to reliable Panther



How Paul Maurice turned Niko Mikkola into a playoff asset



Why Niko Mikkolaâ€™s presence matters for Aleksander Barkov and Sergei Bobrovsky



The Florida Panthers have plenty of stars. Aleksander Barkov anchors the offense. Sergei Bobrovsky continues to stand tall in goal. Matthew Tkachuk thrives in the spotlight. Yet, behind the headlines, defenseman Niko Mikkola has become the kind of player every championship roster needs: steady, physical, and quietly effective.His path to South Florida was far from straightforward. Drafted by the St. Louis Blues in 2015, Mikkola struggled to find consistent minutes early in his NHL career. A brief stint with the New York Rangers added little clarity about his future. But since signing with Florida in 2023, heâ€™s grown into a dependable presence on the Panthersâ€™ blue line.Standing 6-foot-6, Niko Mikkola brings the kind of reach and strength few opponents enjoy facing in his first full season with Florida. Here, he logged 76 games, scoring six goals and adding 16 assists, and more importantly, his playoff performance proved he could step up under pressure.Game 3 of the 2024 Eastern Conference Final against the Carolina Hurricanes. This marked a turning point; Mikkola scored twice, including the game-winner. This helps the Panthers seize control of the series for a player once considered a depth option. It was a breakout moment that showed his value goes far beyond the stat sheet.Florida Panthers coach Paul Maurice has praised Mikkola for his adaptability and intensity. The defensemanâ€™s ability to close space quickly and play an aggressive style makes him fit perfectly into the system Maurice demands.What sets Mikkola apart is his balance between physical play and mobility. He isnâ€™t just big, he can skate, recover, and force opponents into mistakes. Maurice has leaned on him for difficult defensive assignments, trusting that his presence will give stars like Aleksander Barkov and Matthew Tkachuk more room to create offensively.Championship teams are built on depth, and Niko Mikkola provides exactly that. For Aleksander Barkov, knowing the defense behind him can hold firm allows more freedom up front. For Sergei Bobrovsky, Mikkolaâ€™s shot-blocking and crease-clearing presence are invaluable.Brad Marchand, now a teammate in Florida, summed it up well: opponents have no time and space when Mikkola is on the ice. That kind of pressure tilts the game in subtle but significant ways.Mikkola may never grab the same spotlight as Barkov or Bobrovsky, but his emergence as a trusted defenseman ensures the Panthers remain one of the NHLâ€™s toughest teams to break down. For Florida, â€œThe Condorâ€ is no longer a hidden piece; heâ€™s an essential oneAlso Read: NHL Trade Rumor: Will Rasmus Andersson spark a defensive shake-up this season?
Article Summary: Niko mikkola was drafted by the st. louis blues in 2015. The 6-foot-6 defenseman signed with the florida panthers in 2023. He played 76 games last season, scoring six goals and adding 16 assists. His playoff performance proved he could step up under pressure.

Article Title: Hookah storm! 'PR lobby': Irfan Pathan breaks silence after MS Dhoni video controversy explodes
Article Text:
Irfan Pathan and MS Dhoni in action for India (Images via Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

When will CSK legend MS Dhoni retire from IPL? Astrologer Greenstone Lobo predicts

Irfan Pathan on X (Screengrab)

Former India all-rounder Irfan Pathan has reacted sharply after an old interview clip linked to MS Dhoni resurfaced online, sparking heated debate on social media.The video, from years ago, featured Pathan reflecting on his communication with Dhoni during his playing days and included remarks that some interpreted as a cryptic reference to the former captainâ€™s off-field preferences.As the clip gained traction, Pathan took to X with a cryptic post, questioning the motives behind its sudden reappearance. â€œHalf decade old video surfacing NOW with a twisted context to the Statement. Fan war? PR lobby?â€ he wrote, suggesting the resurfacing may have been deliberate. In the interview, Pathan had recalled an incident from the 2008 Australia series when media reports suggested Dhoni was dissatisfied with his bowling.â€œYes, I asked him. During the 2008 Australia series, Mahi bhaiâ€™s statement came out in the media that Irfan wasnâ€™t bowling well. I thought I had bowled well throughout the series, so I went and asked Mahi bhai. Sometimes statements are twisted in the media, so I also wanted to clarify. Mahi bhai said, â€˜No Irfan, there is nothing like this, everythingâ€™s going as per plans.â€™ When you get a reply like this, you believe that okay, you do what you can. Also if you keep asking for explanations again and again after that, you hurt your self-respect,â€ Pathan said.He followed that account with a pointed remark: â€œI donâ€™t have a habit of setting up hookah in someoneâ€™s room or talking about this. Everyone knows. Sometimes if you donâ€™t speak about it, itâ€™s better. A cricketerâ€™s job is to perform on the field and that is what I used to focus on.â€The remarks have ignited a storm of online discussion, with fans divided over whether they were a dig at Dhoni or a broader comment on team culture at the time.By addressing the controversy through his latest post, Pathan has indicated his displeasure at the way the comments have been framed and interpreted, while hinting that the video surfacing again may be part of a deliberate attempt or scheme.
Article Summary: Former india all-rounder irfan pathan has reacted sharply after an old interview clip linked to ms dhoni resurfaced online. The video, from years ago, featured pathan reflecting on his communication with dhoni during his playing days and included remarks that some interpreted as a cryptic reference to the former captain's off-field preferences.

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky and Kobe Bryant jerseys headline a million-dollar Sothebyâ€™s auction
Article Text:
NHL-Wayne Gretzky and Kobe Bryant jerseys headline a million-dollar Sothebyâ€™s auction (Credit: CHARLY TRIBALLEAU / AFP)

Uncovering the Insane Price of Wayne Gretzkys Final Jersey Sold at Auction #NHL #waynegretzky

Wayne Gretzkyâ€™s final NHL point jersey is expected to surpass $1 million



Kobe Bryantâ€™s first No. 24 Los Angeles Lakers jersey returns to the market



Sothebyâ€™s Sports Week to feature rare memorabilia from global icons



Two jerseys tied to defining moments in sports history are set to re-enter the market. Sothebyâ€™s will auction Wayne Gretzkyâ€™s final NHL point jersey and Kobe Bryantâ€™s first No. 24 Los Angeles Lakers jersey on September 30 in New York. Both items are expected to sell for more than $1 million, reflecting their historical and cultural weight.On April 18, 1999, Wayne Gretzky stepped onto the ice for the last time in his storied career. Playing for the New York Rangers against the Pittsburgh Penguins, he set up Brian Leetchâ€™s late second-period goal. That assist became Gretzkyâ€™s 2,857th and final NHL point, capping a career that left him as hockeyâ€™s all-time leading scorer.The jersey he wore during that period is now available for sale again. Sothebyâ€™s confirmed it is one of four sweaters Gretzky used that night, authenticated by MeiGray and the Rangers. It is signed, inscribed with the date, and previously displayed at Madison Square Garden. Collector Rob Gough purchased it for $715,120 in 2023 but is now selling, with expectations that the price will climb past the million-dollar mark.Kobe Bryantâ€™s number change from 8 to 24 ahead of the 2006â€“07 season marked the start of a new phase in his career. He wore the new jersey for the first time on November 3, 2006, scoring 23 points in a win over the Seattle SuperSonics. That year, he averaged 31.6 points per game and won his second straight scoring title.The jersey was originally sold by Upper Deck Authenticated for just $10,875 shortly after the game. Nearly two decades later, the market has undergone a dramatic shift. Bryantâ€™s memorabilia surged in demand following his passing in 2020, with Sothebyâ€™s recently selling his NBA debut jersey for over $7 million. This first No. 24 jersey, signed and inscribed â€œFirst 24,â€ is now expected to cross the million-dollar threshold.The Gretzky and Bryant jerseys will headline Sothebyâ€™s Sports Week on September 30. Gretzkyâ€™s will be sold in a dedicated event titled The Great One at 6 PM ET, followed by Bryantâ€™s in Legends of Sport at 6:15. Both pieces will be displayed at Sothebyâ€™s New York galleries beginning September 20.The wider program includes sneakers worn by Lionel Messi and Serena Williams, as well as Shohei Ohtaniâ€™s 47th home run ball from his 2024 season. Bidding for other collectibles will run online from September 12 to 25.For collectors, these jerseys go beyond fabric and stitching. They capture moments that shaped two careers: Gretzky closing hockeyâ€™s greatest chapter, and Bryant beginning the second half of his Lakers legacy.Also Read: NHL Trade Rumor: Will Rasmus Andersson spark a defensive shake-up this season?
Article Summary: Nhl-wayne gretzky and kobe bryant jerseys headline a million-dollar sothebyâ€™s auction. Both items are expected to sell for more than $1 million, reflecting their historical and cultural weight. The jerseys will be sold in a dedicated event titled the great one at 6 pm et, followed by bryant's in legends of sport.

Article Title: Connor McDavid contract talks take shape after Leon Draisaitlâ€™s record-breaking deal
Article Text:
Connor McDavid (Image Via Twitter)

Connor McDavid, balancing personal value and team success in contract plans



Edmonton Oilers expect Connor McDavid to shape future NHL salary standards

With Connor McDavid closing in on the last year of his current contract, the Edmonton Oilers will face one of the most defining moments in their history. The signing of a $112 million contract for his teammate, Leon Draisaitl, earlier this summer only fuels the speculation that McDavid's contract would follow the same trajectory. In addition, comments from Jeff Jackson, the CEO of the Oilers, in which he stated that Draisaitlâ€™s contract, while respected, would not be the standard for McDavidâ€™s extension talks, also add more to the teasing.On â€œOilers Now,â€ Jeff Jackson brought up McDavidâ€™s appreciation of Draisaitl and the teamâ€™s bigger picture of the organization. While more certainly comes into play with Draisaitlâ€™s record-breaking deal, McDavidâ€™s decisions will certainly be about much more than money. While discussing McDavid, Jackson talked about how humble, thoughtful, and purposeful he is, especially in understanding the need for roster agility.Rather than focusing on the most lucrative deal, McDavid is aiming for an agreement that offers reasonable pay but also allows the Oilers to retain other key players. His conduct mirrors his guiding principles as a leader: McDavid, like many others in leadership roles, seeks to maximize team victories and ensure the organization remains competitive in the long run instead of chasing personal wins or financial milestones.Having signed an eight-year, $100 million deal in 2017, McDavidâ€™s contract will expire after the 2025-26 season. Given the increase in the NHL salary cap and the prospect of McDavidâ€™s next statistically dominant contract, it will likely set the remuneration record. Last season, he achieved 100 points in 67 games and added 33 more in the playoffs, winning the 2024 Conn Smythe Trophy.In August at Canadaâ€™s Olympic camp, McDavid stated that he is not hastening the extensionâ€™s conclusion but is still devoted to Edmonton. His intentions are unmistakable: Winning the Stanley Cup for the Oilers, with the additional aspiration of Olympic gold. To the Oilers, it will be vital to make their captain feel appreciated and supported to successfully sign what will be one of the most important contracts for both the franchise and the NHL.Also Read: Dennis Hildebyâ€™s contract extension sparks strong reaction from Maple Leafs fans Following Leon Draisaitl's recent contract negotiations, McDavid has publicly shut down any rumors of a potential holdout. While his contract is unrelated to Draisaitl's, it is poised to become a defining contract in hockey.
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers expect connor mcdavid to shape future nhl salary standards. Mcdavidâ€™s contract will expire after the 2025-26 season. The signing of a $112 million contract for his teammate, leon draisaitl, earlier this summer fuels the speculation that mcdavid's contract would follow the same trajectory.

Article Title: Jeff Driskel signs with Las Vegas Raiders practice squad ahead of Week 1
Article Text:
Jeff Driskel signs with Las Vegas Raiders practice squad ahead of Week 1 (Image via Getty)

Jeff Driskel brings experience to Raidersâ€™ QB room

Why the Raiders signed Jeff Driskel right now

Jeff Driskel, a 32-year-old veteran quarterback, has just signed with the Las Vegas Raidersâ€™ practice squad on Monday, September 1, 2025, in Las Vegas. This move gives the Raiders more depth at quarterback just before their season opener. Driskel has played for many teams in the NFL and now lands on his ninth one. He arrives as an emergency backup behind starters Geno Smith and Kenny Pickett.Jeff Driskel was drafted in the sixth round of the 2016 NFL Draft by the San Francisco 49ers after playing college football at Florida and Louisiana Tech. Over nearly a decade, heâ€™s worn jerseys for the Bengals, Lions, Broncos, Texans, Cardinals, Browns, and most recently, the Washington Commanders in the 2024 season.In his NFL career, Jeff Driskel has played in 25 games and started 12, winning just 1 and losing 10. He has a career completion rate of about 58.6%, with 16 touchdown passes and 10 interceptions.With the Raiders, Jeff Driskel steps into the practice squad alongside rookie Cam Miller and serves as a reliable fallback if both Geno Smith and Kenny Pickett (who has a hamstring issue) are unavailable.Also Read: â€œRespect Women, Or Elseâ€¦â€: Cardi B Explodes Outside California Courthouse After Offset Brag And Stefon Diggs Pregnancy Question The Raiders made this move just before their Week 1 game against the New England Patriots.Injuries in the quarterback room, like Kenny Pickettâ€™s hamstring and Aidan Oâ€™Connellâ€™s preseason wrist injury, made insurance necessary.Jeff Driskel connects well with the Raidersâ€™ system, too. Chip Kelly, Las Vegasâ€™s offensive coordinator, was the 49ersâ€™ head coach when Driskel was drafted in 2016.Even though Cam Miller is also on the practice squad, Jeff Driskelâ€™s addition means Miller is no longer the immediate backup call-up.
Article Summary: Jeff driskel signs with las vegas raiders practice squad ahead of week 1. The 32-year-old veteran quarterback has just signed with the raidersâ€™ practice squad on monday, september 1, 2025, in las vegas. He arrives as an emergency backup behind starters geno smith and kenny pickett.

Article Title: Eagles star Saquon Barkley announces Amazon Prime documentary ahead of NFL season opener
Article Text:
Saquon Barkley (Image Source: Getty)

Inside the story of Saquon Barkley

Itâ€™s been a five-year journey. Iâ€™ve been using this as my diary, as my therapy,â€

â€œThe heart of this film beats strongest away from the stadium, where Saquonâ€™s identity as a father, husband, and friend reveals a man whose priorities transcend yardage and contracts.â€

The significance of timing and storytelling

For the first time, fans will be able to see Saquon's life on and off the field in a documentary film directed by David E. Talbert, who has released his share of blockbusters such as â€˜Think Like a Manâ€™ and â€˜Jingle Jangle: A Christmas Journey. â€™ Saquon announced on the eve of the Philadelphia Eagles' season opener. Titled â€˜Saquon,â€™ the film also features legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese serving as executive producer, and is set to premiere on Amazon Prime Video on Thursday, October 9, coinciding with an equally significant Thursday Night Football matchup in which the Eagles face Barkleyâ€™s former team, the New York Giants.Saquon follows Barkley through his last five years, promising a candid and introspective view of some of the most important events in his life, at least based on press releases and the film's trailer. Fans will witness both the messy contract negotiations with the Giants and the shocking turn that followed, including signing the dotted line for the Eagles and winning a Super Bowl that solidified his legacy. But they'll also see his recovery from ACL surgery.The movie goes far beyond stats and plays of the Eagles' star. The story also dives deep into the personal side of the athlete: his relationships, his role as a father and partner, and the emotional process he describes as both â€œa diaryâ€ and â€œtherapy.â€ Barkleyâ€™s voice rings throughout: â€œhe says in the teaser. The press release adds,Also Read: Saquon Barkley credits Christianity for unlocking the best year of his NFL career The release of the movie isn't just a clever option; it's a strategic option. Throw in the fact that it'll also mark the night Barkley returns to MetLife Stadium to play his former team, and you have a serious narrative juggernaut. Not by coincidence, of course, considering the superstructure of a whole day of Barkley content afterward, moving the spectacle beyond the gridiron.Of course, it doesn't hurt to have a little pedigree; Martin Scorsese executive produces. Scorsese is obviously a cinematic master, and his presence bodes well for a documentary that will delve deeper than the average sports narrative.Barkley is following in the footsteps of Eagles legend Jason Kelce, as Kelce's own version of this film premiered on Prime Video in September 2023. In Saquon, fans are getting a storyline that mixes athletic excellence, personal redemption, and big-screen drama in one package.
Article Summary: Philadelphia eagles running back saquon barkley will be the subject of a documentary film. The film, directed by david e. talbert, also features martin scorsese as executive producer. It will premiere on amazon prime video on thursday, october 9, coinciding with an equally significant thursday night football matchup.

While she resumed on-court activities in mid-August, she has not been cleared for competitive play. Chicagoâ€™s medical staff continues to monitor her closely, maintaining a careful rehabilitation schedule.Despite her absence, Reeseâ€™s 2025 campaign stands out as one of the most dominant in the league. Her numbers underscore her role as Chicago â€™s centerpiece.â€¢ Reese leads the WNBA in rebounds, averaging 12.6 per game.â€¢ She set a league record with 15 consecutive double-doubles, finishing with 19 total this season.â€¢ Her versatility as a scorer, rebounder, and playmaker has made her a triple-double threat throughout the year.Reese has delivered standout showings when facing the Sun this season, marking both historic achievements and competitive battles.Her consistent rebounding and playmaking against Connecticut underline her importance in this rivalry.The Chicago Sky currently hold an 8-22 record, sitting 5th in the Eastern Conference. Without Reeseâ€™s presence:â€¢ The team has struggled to maintain scoring balance and rebounding dominance.â€¢ Several close games have slipped away due to the absence of her playmaking.â€¢ Coach Marsh has reiterated that the team needs her fully healthy to mount any competitive push in the final stretch of the season.Angel Reese will not be on the floor against the Connecticut Sun tonight, and her return date remains uncertain as she continues recovering from a lingering back injury. Her league-leading rebounding numbers, historic streak of double-doubles, and proven impact against Connecticut highlight just how much the Sky are missing her.Fans and teammates alike are eagerly awaiting updates, while the organization takes a cautious approach to ensure that Reese comes back fully healthy to resume her pivotal role for Chicago.Also read: Connecticut Sun vs Chicago Sky Prediction, Odds, Best WNBA Prop Bets, Moneyline, Spread, and More (September 3, 2025) Further updates on Reeseâ€™s recovery or Chicago Sky roster changes will shape the teamâ€™s trajectory for the remainder of the 2025 season.

Article Title: Boston Red Sox rookie Roman Anthony leaves game in pain and lands on injured list with major setback
Article Text:
Boston Red Sox rookie Roman Anthony leaves game in pain and lands on injured list with major setback (Image Via Getty)

Roman Anthony exits Guardians game early after clear signs of discomfort

â€œIt sounds harsh, but we have to move on,â€

Also Read:

Roman Anthonyâ€™s impact and what his absence means for the Red Sox



Roman Anthony, the 21-year-old outfielder for the Boston Red Sox, was placed on the injured list on Wednesday, September 3, after suffering a left oblique strain. The injury happened Tuesday night during Bostonâ€™s 11-7 win over the Cleveland Guardians at Fenway Park. Anthony struck out in the fourth inning and was seen holding his left side before leaving the game. He later underwent an MRI that confirmed the strain. Manager Alex Cora explained on WEEI radio that these injuries usually take four to six weeks, which could rule Anthony out for the rest of the regular season.Roman Anthonyâ€™s injury became clear on Tuesday, September 2, when he swung and missed at a pitch during the bottom of the fourth inning at Fenway Park.After the strikeout, he bent slightly, placed a hand near his ribs, and walked straight back to the dugout. He was quickly replaced in the outfield by Nate Eaton.The following morning, September 3, the Red Sox confirmed he would go on the 10-day injured list. Manager Alex Cora said,adding that a normal recovery for such an injury takes at least four weeks. Anthony had been scheduled for more tests after his MRI.Oblique strains are known to be tricky for hitters, making sudden swings painful and sometimes leading to setbacks. This puts Boston in a tough spot with only three weeks left in the season and every game carrying playoff weight.Since being called up in June, Roman Anthony has played in 71 games and turned into one of Bostonâ€™s most valuable hitters. He carried a .292 batting average, eight home runs, and a 3.1 WAR into September.His ability to reach base and cover ground in the outfield gave the Red Sox a lift during their midseason surge. Without him, the team will rely on Nick Sogard, who was promoted to replace him on the roster, along with players like Rob Refsnyder and Ceddanne Rafaela.Boston entered Wednesday with a 78-62 record, sitting 2Â½ games behind the Toronto Blue Jays for first in the AL East. They are tied with the New York Yankees for the top wild-card spot.While Anthony could return during the playoffs if the Red Sox advance, the immediate concern is how the lineup can hold up without one of its most consistent young stars.
Article Summary: Boston red sox rookie roman anthony leaves game in pain and lands on injured list with major setback. The 21-year-old outfielder suffered a left oblique strain. Manager alex cora explained that these injuries usually take four to six weeks, which could rule anthony out for the rest of the regular season.
